availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Paducah, Kentucky, engineer. Kentucky native. Married to Caroline Davis. Father of James J. Davis, George R. Davis, and Kate E. Davis Bonnin. Engineer in Paducah, Kentucky in 1850. Engineer in Paducah, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken, Paducah and Suburbs, p. 136B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah, District 2, p. 111.
